title: Start
body:
Hello, my adorable and sweet animal of the Santa Cruz forest. 
I am the one true Banana Slug - the deity that has protected this land for centuries.
However, the humans have now taken over what was once ours.
They built on top of what was once beautiful trees and sacred rivers, displacing the wildlife and destroying the trees.
As the prophet, the Lorax, once said:
“I am the Lorax. I speak for the trees for the trees have no tongues.  I am asking you, sir, at the top of my lungs. Oh please do not cut down another one.”
He ate. 
And I agree.   
Not only have they hurt the environment, but they have TAKEN MY IMAGE AND NAME IN VAIN! 
WITH A HIDEOUS, PANTS-LESS BIRKENSTOCK-WEARING, BLASHPHEMOUS MASCOT !
This brings me to my mission for you - the reason why I appear to you in this apparition
Defeat the one who has taken the forest from us: Chacellor Larvae.
But to get to Larvae, you must defeat their two underlings and collect the items they drop. These two hold what you need to defeat the Chancellor.
First, destroy the blasphemous iconography that uses the likeness of my image.
I will send you to the UCSC Bookstore, where you will find.. Sammy the Slug
Attack him 10 times or something and that should be good enough to defeat him. 
You have to get close to attack him, but if you get too close you can get hurt.
Go on, my child. 
I will see you very soon. 
Xoxo.

title: Death
body:
YOU ARE DUMB. HOW COULD YOU HAVE DIED?
Today is your lucky day, because I am so generous.
I will grant you with another life. 
Do not mess this up for me.

title: DHall
body:
You have done well, my child. 
uwu <3 !
For your next task, I will send you to the dining hall to take on the next in power.
…
You know, I pity them… the humans here.
They have lost all feeling, becoming zombies mindlessly working for the system that exploits them.
A system that forces them to pick up multiple, minimum wage jobs that barely help them pay back what the institution asks of them. 
I know the humans have hurt me, but above all I am kind <3 and I despise the system as well.
…
Save them by defeating the Green Shirt.
But be warned, they are protected by their army of Blue Shirts. 
Collect the apples and throw them at all of them until they lose their health. But be careful - do not run out of your GET points!
Free the workers, disrupt the system, and get Chancellor Larvae’s attention.
Now, go!

title: Chancellor
body:
Oh ****
You sure got the Chancellor’s attention, and they are NOT happy. 
Quick, I bestow my powers onto this Eco Friendly Fork. Although I, your deity, cannot fight this battle for you, I will give you the strength needed to fight this battle for yourself. You just have to believe in me.
Now go!
Huh, oh the slime?
Lmao tbh you didn’t need the slime. I just wanted a free face mask for Self Care Sunday!!!
SELF CARE SUNDAY !!!!
Woooo yea wooo yea
Woooo yea wooo uh uh uh uh uh yea woooo
LMAOOOO are u mad? 
HAHAHAHA
YOU’RE MAD YOU’RE MAD YO-

title: Victory
body:
You’re confused, aren’t you?
The maggots… Larvae… was once my friend, a companion even. 
We protected this forest together. But… Larvae wanted more power than me. They challenged my title, questioned my strength. I turned them away and banished them from the forest. 
Out of spite, Larvae created a skin suit and pretended to be human - building over what we once protected… together
Every couple of years they changed their skin suit to maintain their power.
All of the Chancellors that ruled over UCSC have been all one in the same… hurting us… for that reason. 
But you, my child, have freed us. Not only the animals of the forest, but the students as well. 
Now, a new person in power can be installed - one that protects the campus, cares for their students, and makes the world a better place. 
Thank you.
